hero.headline: End-to-end enterprise UX.
hero.subtitle: From initial discovery through design systems and ongoing support. We bring deep expertise in industrial and enterprise experience design.

phases.heading: Discovery & Research
phases.description: Understanding your world before we design. Field visits, user interviews, workflow mapping, and contextual analysis.

services.title: Contextual Inquiry
services.description: On-site observation of your users and workflows in their actual environment.

services.title: User Interviews
services.description: Deep conversations with operators, managers, and decision-makers about their needs and pain points.

services.title: Workflow Mapping
services.description: Detailed documentation of how work actually happens (not how you think it happens).

services.title: Competitive Analysis
services.description: Understanding how similar challenges are solved in comparable industries.

phases.heading: Strategy & Design
phases.description: Creating the vision and bringing it to life. Conceptual frameworks, interaction design, and visual systems.

services.title: Product Strategy
services.description: Defining scope, phasing, and roadmap aligned with business goals.

services.title: Information Architecture
services.description: Organizing complex information into intuitive mental models.

services.title: Interaction Design
services.description: Designing how users interact with the system at every touch point.

services.title: Visual Design
services.description: Creating clarity and consistency through thoughtful visual hierarchy and design systems.

phases.heading: Implementation & Scale
phases.description: Building sustainable systems that work across organizations. Design systems, governance, and change management.

services.title: Design Systems
services.description: Component libraries, design tokens, and documentation for consistent implementation at scale.

services.title: Development Handoff
services.description: Detailed specifications, interactive prototypes, and ongoing support for engineering teams.

services.title: Usability Testing
services.description: Validation with real users throughout the development process.

services.title: Training & Documentation
services.description: Ensuring your team can maintain and extend the design system over time.

cards.name: Energy & Utilities
cards.description: Oil, gas, nuclear, renewables. From exploration to operations to grid management.

cards.name: Maritime & Offshore
cards.description: Shipping, offshore operations, subsea infrastructure. Safety-critical at global scale.

cards.name: Industrial Operations
cards.description: Manufacturing, mining, utilities. Where operational efficiency directly impacts bottom line.

cards.name: Financial Services
cards.description: Trading, operations, compliance. High-stakes decision-making with regulatory complexity.
